targets.query: SELECT last("num_indoubt_trans") FROM "snapdb" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("appls_cur_cons") FROM "snapdb" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

select mean(count_my_cost) from (SELECT count("my_cost") as count_my_cost FROM "snapappl" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "appl_name", time(5m)) GROUP BY time($inter), "appl_name" fill(null)
select mean("non_negative_difference") from (SELECT non_negative_difference("dynamic_sql") FROM "snapdb2" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time($inter)
select mean("non_negative_difference") from (SELECT non_negative_difference("static_sql") FROM "snapdb2" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time($inter)
select mean("non_negative_difference") from (SELECT non_negative_difference("commit_sql") FROM "snapdb2" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time($inter)
select mean("non_negative_difference") from (SELECT non_negative_difference("rollback_sql") FROM "snapdb2" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time($inter)

select agent_id, appl_name, client_ip, auth_id, exec_id, TOP(diff_usr_cpu_time_s,5) as cpu_time from (SELECT (non_negative_difference(/usr_cpu_time_s|sys_cpu_time_s/)) as diff FROM "snapappl" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter group by agent_id, appl_name, client_ip, auth_id, exec_id)

SELECT MEAN(diff_usr_cpu_time_s) as usr_cpu_time_mean FROM (SELECT (non_negative_difference(/usr_cpu_time_s|sys_cpu_time_s/)) as diff FROM "snapappl" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "agent_id", "appl_name", "appl_id", "auth_id") WHERE diff_usr_cpu_time_s > 60 GROUP BY time($inter), "appl_name"

SELECT "agent_id", "appl_name", "rows_read", "rows_selected", TOP(max_cost,5) as cost FROM (SELECT MAX(my_cost) as max_cost, "appl_name", "rows_read", "rows_selected" FROM "snapappl" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "agent_id")

panels.description: Interval = auto, critical > 10000000, cost > 1000, Query-Cost = Rows_Read / Rows_Selected

targets.query: SELECT MEAN("my_cost") FROM "snapappl" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$db$/) AND "my_cost" > 1000 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "appl_name"

panels.title: Appls - High Query-Cost

targets.query: SELECT "appl_handle", "appl_name", "auth_id", TOP(max_elapsed_time_sec,5) as elapsed_time, "stmt_text" FROM (SELECT MAX(elapsed_time_sec) as max_elapsed_time_sec ,"appl_handle", "appl_name","stmt_text"  FROM "longsql" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "appl_name","auth_id")

select mean(count_my_cost) from (SELECT count("my_cost") as count_my_cost FROM "snapappl" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "auth_id", time(5m) ) GROUP BY time($inter), "auth_id" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN(user_count) FROM (SELECT count("my_cost") as user_count FROM "snapappl" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m), "auth_id") GROUP BY time($inter), "auth_id" fill(none)

list.definition: show tag values from "snapdb" with key="db"
list.label: DB
list.name: db
list.query: show tag values from "snapdb" with key="db"
